sentences.en: As you create your interfaces, you should constantly be looking to simplify visually.
sentences.cn: 创作界面时, 你必须不断地在视觉方面将其简化.

sentences.en: Chairs should be visually attractive as well as comfortable.
sentences.cn: 椅子既要美观也要舒适。

sentences.en: Drop candidates must visually indicate their receptivity.
sentences.cn: 拖放候选对象必须在视觉上显示其接受能力.

sentences.en: He explained the journey visually by use of pictures.
sentences.cn: 他运用图片形象地讲述了这次旅行.

sentences.en: His style is slick and visually exciting.
sentences.cn: 他的演技娴熟，赏心悦目。

sentences.en: Our findings relate to physically rather than the visually handicapped pupils.
sentences.cn: 我们的研究结果是关于肢体残疾的学生,而不是视力有障碍的学生.

sentences.en: Shadows work pretty well, but all those grids and shadows can get in the way visually.
sentences.cn: 阴影能起到很好的作用, 但阴影和网格在视觉上会互相影响.

sentences.en: That is a visually stunning piece of cinema.
sentences.cn: 那是一部视觉效果令人惊叹的电影。

sentences.en: The drag cursor must visually identify the source object.
sentences.cn: 拖动光标必须在视觉上表示源对象.

sentences.en: The infestation of avocado root rot disease is not visually detectable.
sentences.cn: 鳄梨树根腐病的感染用视觉是无法探测出来的.

sentences.en: There are 1.7 million blind and visually impaired people in Britain.
sentences.cn: 英国有170万失明和视力受损人口。

sentences.en: They are visually very similar to modal dialog boxes, but they are functionally very different.
sentences.cn: 它们在视觉上与模态对话框非常相似, 但功能不同.

sentences.en: Visually differentiate modeless dialogs from modal dialogs.
sentences.cn: 视觉上区分非模态对话框与模态对话框.

sentences.en: Visually the chair is very pleasing, but it's uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 这椅子看上去很可爱, 但它并不舒服.

words.tran_cn: 形象化；清楚地呈现在心
使形象化；想像（visualize的过去分词）
形象化地；外表上；看得见地

trans.tran_cn: 视觉上，外表上，看得见地，形象化地
